import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import '../../service_preview_page.css'; import {VIDEO_DUBB_PREVIEW,DUBBED_VIDEO_DOWNLOAD} from '../../../../url'; class Preview extends Component { state={ dubb_id:'', video_details:[] } componentDidMount() { this.setState({dubb_id:this.props.match.params.dubb_id}) axios.post(VIDEO_DUBB_PREVIEW,{ id:this.props.match.params.dubb_id }) .then(response=>{ var result=response.data; if(result.success=="1") { this.setState({video_details:result.data}); } }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); }); } downloadVideo=(dubb_id,title)=> { axios({ url: DUBBED_VIDEO_DOWNLOAD, //your url method: 'POST', responseType: 'blob', // important data:{dubb_id:dubb_id}, }).then((response) => { const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data])); const link = document.createElement('a'); link.href = url; link.setAttribute('download', title); //or any other extension document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); }); } render() { const {video_details}=this.state; const link=this.props.location.pathname; return(

{video_details.dubb_id}

{video_details.email}

{video_details.original_language}

{video_details.video_length}

{video_details.dubbed_language}

{video_details.priority=='0' && Low} {video_details.priority=='1' && Medium} {video_details.priority=='2' && High}

{video_details.AccountId}

{video_details.created_at}

{video_details.status=='0' && Queued} {video_details.status=='1' && In Progress} {video_details.status=='2' && Preview Available}

{video_details.payment_id==null?'Pending':'Completed'}

{video_details.payment_id!=null &&

{video_details.payment_id}

} {video_details.payment_id==null &&

Rs. {video_details.price}

}
{video_details.payment_id==null?: }

{video_details.dubbed_language}

{video_details.priority=='0' && Low} {video_details.priority=='1' && Medium} {video_details.priority=='2' && High}

{video_details.AccountId}

{video_details.created_at}

{video_details.status=='0' && Queued} {video_details.status=='1' && In Progress} {video_details.status=='2' && Preview Available}

{video_details.payment_id==null?'Pending':'Completed'}

{video_details.payment_id!=null &&

{video_details.payment_id}

} {video_details.payment_id==null &&

Total Amount:

Rs. {video_details.price}

}
*/}
); } } export default Preview;
